thread.title: BREAKING: Body of Brit tot, 2, found in river just one hour after being reported missing
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Body of Brit tot, 2, found in river just one hour after being reported missing

title: BREAKING: Body of Brit tot, 2, found in river just one hour after being reported missing
text:
DS 
A major search was launched after the child was reported missing from a property in the Milton of Drimmie area in Perthshire, Scotland, at around 11.15am. 
The Police Scotland helicopter and Scottish Fire and Rescue were involved in a full search of the area along with police officers. 
The child was located in the River Ericht, close to the property, at around 12.35pm. “Tragically, the boy did not survive” Police Scotland 
He was removed from the water by fire personnel and treated by paramedics, who had attended the scene with the air ambulance, however the boy died. 
In a statement Police Scotland said: "Tragically, the boy did not survive. 
"His family are being supported by officers at this time." 
MORE TO FOLLOW
